name: Gina's Garden Lodges

reviews.text: well its quite hard to write this review as i thought the owner gina was a lovley character but i thought i'd better warn future customers. the area is slightly remote although this can make it feel quite idylic. however, the rooms have a bug probel. in 3 nights we had to contend with about 6 cockraoches and 3 geekos (these are large lizard creatures but they are harmless and scared of people). the cockroaches were HUGE are just horrible!
reviews.title: ok but far too many bugs!

description: Gina’s has two properties on Aitutaki Island, Cook Islands. One - Gina's Garden Lodges, is on the main island, and is about 5 minutes walk from the Tautu landing, on the Eastern shores of Aitutaki lagoon. The second, beach side property is situated on one of the reef islands at Akaiami Island - 5 miles across the lagoon. This is Gina's Akaiami Beach Lodge. We are family friendly and welcome children of all ages. Both of these locales offer an environment that is special to Eastern Polynesia, and in their own way give reality to those Pacific dreams which travelers seek, and which cannot be found at Resort Hotels.
